constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 66 (Thursday, April 21, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 7558.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clauses 17 and 18 of section 8 of article I of the
Constitution.
[Page H4454]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

title: Breastfeeding Mothers Jury Duty Exclusion Act of 2022
